about_the_game:
RHYUP is a challenging, 5 button rhythm game with shmup elements. Defend your home planet as you take control of a spaceship and move and shoot to the beat of the music while weaving through an onslaught of eye catching, enemy fire and boss fights all set to an amazing sound track. The demo includes 4 songs and levels.

Minimum requirements are for low settings 30+ FPS.
detailed_description:
RHYUP is a challenging, 5 button rhythm game with shmup elements. Defend your home planet as you take control of a spaceship and move and shoot to the beat of the music while weaving through an onslaught of eye catching, enemy fire and boss fights all set to an amazing sound track. The demo includes 4 songs and levels.

Minimum requirements are for low settings 30+ FPS.
name: RHYUP Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 3610QM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 650m 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6500
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce 1060 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 330 MB available space
